metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20153 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In rcu_cblist_dequeue of rcu_segcblist.c, there is a possibleuse-after-free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalationof privilege in the kernel with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-222091980References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
